AUTHOR: Aioxas, irdumb
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing my cog. 
[p]help Images should be enough. If not [p]add_image, [p]imageset, [p]del_image, [p]list_images
NAME: images
SHORT: Local image summoning, has the ability to add, remove, or list images. Based on irdumb's sadface cog.
DESCRIPTION:
images has the ability to add or remove images that will trigger with the keyword they were added in. This cog is per-server. You can also list the images per specified type.
 This cog was made possible by irdumb's sadface cog, as it provided an existing structure.
